name: Easter Drop - Eggs Falling Down!
description:
“Fast-paced Game play”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Awesome music”
___________________________________

Easter is fast approaching and the chickens are busy laying eggs! Easter Drop is an amazing, highly entertaining ipad game with beautiful graphics and amusing, music.

In this Easter Drop game, your aim is to lower a funny Easter egg as soon as possible. As eggs start rolling down the red slides, make use of the controls to avoid getting at the top of the screen. With every passing moment, movement up is accelerated and you need to cope up with the increasing speed. Enjoy!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
New backgrounds and sound effects
Bonus points and powerups
Super-responsive touch controls
Awesome graphics.
